sentence.Network_en: The cloud should then have an infrared luminosity thousands of times the sun's bolometric luminosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 云的红外光度应为太阳热光度的几千倍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 电子吸收红外线被激发，电荷平衡过程中，系统温度上升导致电阻变化，称为辐射热(Bolometric)效应。因此，操作量子霍尔感测器感 …
bolometers 测辐射热计, bolometric 辐射热的, bolometers 辐射热计

list.abs: 天文学名词词汇一... ... bolometric light curve 全波光变曲线 bolometric temperature 热温度 Bootes void 牧夫巨洞.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a bolometer

auth_sentence.content: Each planet has a characteristic 'bolometric temperature'.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each planet has a characteristic 'bolometric temperature'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each planet has a characteristic 'bolometric temperature'.

auth_sentence.content: So what I call the 'bolometric pressure' of the two planets is almost identical.
auth_sentence.res_content: So what I call the 'bolometric pressure' of the two planets is almost identical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So what I call the 'bolometric pressure' of the two planets is almost identical.

auth_sentence.content: We can identify a layer of each planet's atmosphere that corresponds to the bolometric temperature.
auth_sentence.res_content: We can identify a layer of each planet's atmosphere that corresponds to the bolometric temperature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We can identify a layer of each planet's atmosphere that corresponds to the bolometric temperature.
